description:
Suzuko and Hanna follow the rumors of a "broker", a man who will set up Wixoss matches for those who need them.  When Suzuko hears that Chinatsu is involved with the broker, she agrees to enter his system in exchange for her whereabouts.  But when she finally does meet Chinatsu, she finds that the encounter doesn`t go as planned...
Source: crunchyroll
